Megatron:





Megatron stepped to Dark Mouse and back-handed her again. "I will be the one 
to ask the questions, vermin!" he snarled at her. He turned his cold eyes to 
Dracona. He took a step closer to her and took the straps off of her. But 
before she could make any attempt to escape, he grabbed her by the throat 
and swung her around. He had her several feet off of the ground.

"Now, we shall talk, yes." he said to Dracona. "What were you doing here?" 
He squeezed a little tighter around her neck. "And what is your concern for 
the devise?"
